comment.author: 8293801@N07
comment._content: Nice to see a photo from this region here.

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Glad you found it!  We have photos worldwide because of Mennonite involvement in international relief, service, and mission work.

comment.author: 8293801@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mennonitechurchusa-archives] I'm always interested in earlier photos of the area and the immediate post-war era is particularly interesting. Back then this was a british occupation zone. But in this case I would not be able to identify the exact location even if I printed out the photo and walked through the town of Kapfenberg because I'm almost certain these wooden barracks have been replaced by other buildings since then.
